bibl.title: Numismatic Evidence on the Ptolemaic Involvement in Thrace During the Second Syrian War.
bibl.note: Presents a numismatic survey of the city of Byzantion that was renamed Ptolemais for a short period to honor Ptolemy II. - Denominations. - Issuing Authorities. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Selene Psoma, Numismatic Evidence on the Ptolemaic Involvement in Thrace During the Second Syrian War.
Presents a numismatic survey of the city of Byzantion that was renamed Ptolemais for a short period to honor Ptolemy II. - Denominations. - Issuing Authorities. - Avec résumé en anglais.
